title: Recruiting for a Casual Team
body:
Want to join a ranked flex squad that will play 1-2 nights a week? This is mainly for fun but we do take the game serious. So expect good non-toxic attitudes and people who don't want to surrender when it gets tough. 

We'll have about 7-9 people on the team because it is a casual flexible team, so you can play when you want. We have a game on Mon and Sat nights AEST. Most people will be around silver/gold.

Msg me in game- Hesed.

replies.body: Still open for some  players if you're keen. This isn't a "set" team as a Club, so we have a schedule optional game time people can jump in a play ranked flex.
lol I just sent you a request before I read this. We're looking for another mid.
Would you be ok with taking a player who's a rank off silver in solo/duo? i haven't been ranked in flex yet. i mostly play support and a little bit of mid and adc.
Yea no worries. Hit me up in game...Hesed and I'll share the discord.
